title: Twisted Treeline / Gewundener Wald Belohnungen
body:
Weiß jemand etwas Genaues über die Twisted Treeline Belohnungen, und wann man sie bekommt? Die Saisonbelohnungen wurden ja bereits ausgeteilt wie ich gesehen habe. Zum Thema Twisted Treeline war allerdings nichts dabei.

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body:
"Twisted Treeline is officially retiring with 9.23. Thank you to every player who's made the Treeline their home over the years! Your rewards will be distributed during the patch. As a refresher:

    Players who played more than 10 games will get an exclusive icon
    Players who played more than 50 games will also get an exclusive emote
    Players who played more than 100 games will also get a second exclusive icon"

> [{quoted}](name=Hakkuu,realm=EUW,application-id=cGRapXds,discussion-id=c4OPZBs3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-25T12:11:26.164+0000)
>
> "Twisted Treeline is officially retiring with 9.23. Thank you to every player who's made the Treeline their home over the years! Your rewards will be distributed during the patch. As a refresher:
> 
>     Players who played more than 10 games will get an exclusive icon
>     Players who played more than 50 games will also get an exclusive emote
>     Players who played more than 100 games will also get a second exclusive icon"

Da das wissen ja alle. Aber wann wird das passieren?{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

> [{quoted}](name=Phoenixale,realm=EUW,application-id=cGRapXds,discussion-id=c4OPZBs3,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-12-02T17:35:17.938+0000)
>
> Da das wissen ja alle. Aber wann wird das passieren?{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

Da steht doch eindeutig "during this patch". Eine genauere Info kann dir auch der Support nicht geben.
Hab bisher auch noch nichts bekommen. Habe den Support kontaktiert aber dieser meinte nur ich solle noch warten.
